transactionSavedDesc: Your transaction has been successfully recorded.

fillFormBelow: Fill out the form below to add a new transaction.

tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your filters or add new transactions.
deleteTransactionConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction? this action cannot be undone.

couldNotLoadTransactionEdit: Could not load the transaction for editing. please try again.
dateRangeTooLargeError: The selected date range cannot exceed 1 year.
confirmToggleStatusMessage: Are you sure you want to change the status of this recurring definition?
confirmRemoveDefinitionMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this recurring transaction definition? this will not delete past transactions.
statusToggledDesc: The recurring definition status has been updated.
definitionRemovedDesc: The recurring transaction definition has been removed.
selectCategoryStepDesc: Select a category to associate with your new transaction.
